# renderTransform

**Instance Property**

A transform to apply to the source image.

## Declaration

```swift
var renderTransform: CGAffineTransform { get }
```

## Discussion

The transform to apply to the source image incorporating the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoCompositionRenderContext/renderScale], [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoCompositionRenderContext/pixelAspectRatio], and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoCompositionRenderContext/edgeWidths].

The coordinate system origin is the top left corner of the buffer.

## Getting the render settings

- **videoComposition**: The video composition being rendered.
- **highQualityRendering**: The rendering quality to use.
- **renderScale**: A scaling ratio that is applied when rendering frames.
- **size**: The width and height for the rendering frames.
